attributes.action: both for himself and fellow members of the cabinet to set an example to bank chief executives, accept some responsibility for the current economic situation and forego pension rights earned over the period they have been in government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the PM and his Chancellor are asking Sir Fred Goodwin to forego his pension earned at RBS, they, and their fellow cabinet members, should forego their own pension rights given the economic mess they have, at least in part, created.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
